requiredEquipmentExplanation: The workout video is explicitly described as a 'No Equipment' workout in both the title and the description. The title '20 MIN CARDIO HIIT WORKOUT - ALL STANDING - Full Body, No Equipment, No Repeats' highlights that the workout is designed to be performed without any equipment. Additionally, the description also states 'No Equipment,' reinforcing that the exercises can be done using bodyweight only. The video tags, such as 'no equipment workout' and 'full body hiit workout no equipment,' further confirm this classification, as they emphasize the lack of necessity for any equipment to perform the workout. Therefore, based on the metadata analysis, no equipment is required for this workout, making it accessible to everyone, anywhere. The comments also do not mention or suggest any need for equipment, affirming the bodyweight-only nature of this workout.
